amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to add an additional limitation to when the Secretary may execute the first drawdown of petroleum products in the reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Cleaver.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
